bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: MultiLayerNetwork.numParams(): NPE if net has not been initialized
bug.description: calling MultiLayerNetwork.numParams() before .init() gives a null pointer exception. Also: the javadoc is inaccurate; should say that it returns the number of parameters (including biases) for the network.

comments.comment: returns 0 with a logger message saying call init <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/1824>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/1824</denchmark-link>
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
